ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Forage gets better!
ygData.msgSnippet: i was at a guild event where a fbss went only to melee classes, bards not allowed.  i was steamed a bit, since a haste sash and another yak is all i need
ygData.messageBody:
i was at a guild event where a fbss went only to melee classes, bards not
allowed. i was steamed a bit, since a haste sash and another yak is all i
need before planes. (but since it was generously donated for the event i
got over it quick)

a week before this, an enchanter mentioned in a vox raid what would a bard
need with a runed bolster belt that was being lotto'd.

i'm starting to get the impression that tossing good gear at bards is a
perceived waste to my guild.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Cranfill, Wendy [mailto:Wendy_Cranfill@...]
> Sent: Thursday, March 30, 2000 10:06 AM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Forage gets better!
<snip>
>
> And Bards are kind of left out of the loop even more being the most hybrid
> of the hybrids....I've been in lord room lottos where bards were not even
> allowed in the Ykesha lotto because "they don't need them as much as
> rangers.' Puuuhhhleeeeeeze.
